lead_paragraph: The women say they felt compelled to speak after Mr. Trump on Sunday denied ever engaging in such conduct. One says she encountered him on a plane, the other in Trump Tower.

byline.original: By MEGAN TWOHEY and MICHAEL BARBARO

headline.print_headline: Two Women Say Trump Made Unwanted Advances Long Ago
headline.main: Two Women Say Donald Trump Touched Them Inappropriately

snippet: The women say they felt compelled to speak after Mr. Trump on Sunday denied ever engaging in such conduct. One says she encountered him on a plane, the other in Trump Tower....
abstract: Jessica Leeds and Rachel Crooks come forward with stories of how Donald Trump made unwanted sexual advances to them; Trump's behavior in both incidents, which happened over three decades ago and in 2005, respectively, bears similarity to comments in 2005 video in which he bragged about groping women and kissing them without permission; Trump denies allegations.
